tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    agenda_title VARCHAR(255),
    agenda_description TEXT,
    organizer_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_time TIME,
    meeting_topic VARCHAR(255),
    organizer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE agendas (
    agenda_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    agenda_description TEXT,
    assigned_to INT,
    due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE meetings (
    meeting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    organizer VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE attendees (
    attendee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id UUID REFERENCES meetings(meeting_id),
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    attendee_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meetings(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE agendas (
    agenda_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agenda_topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    agenda_description TEXT,
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meetings(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    note_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    note_date DATE NOT NULL,
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meetings(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MeetingSchedule (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    topic TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MeetingAgenda (
    agenda_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    agenda_item TEXT,
    presenter TEXT,
    time_estimated TIME,
    time_actual TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    role TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ActionItems (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    action_item TEXT,
    assignee TEXT,
    due_date DATE,
    status TEXT
);
